channel.title: How to change starter skill level
channel.description: hi guys so i got this new source but when i logged on it automatically gave me 99 firemaking how do i change that ?? plz help

item.title: How to change starter skill level
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.source: How to change starter skill level

item.title: How to change starter skill level
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Yours was unexplained and he already said he didn’t know what the login message was. I wouldn’t have posted if I thought you had done a better job helping.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starter skill level

item.title: How to change starter skill level
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:11, topic:359417”]Okay this is ridicules, open Player class (Player.java)
Look for

addSkillXP

You should see something like

addSkillXP(14000000, 11);

Delete it.

If you cannot find that code in Player class, look in the initialize method in Client class

public void initialize()

I made a simular guide telling him exactly what to do in shorter terms:

1. Search for your welcome message
2. Search for addSkillXP
3. DELETE THE LINE

No way in hell is understanding yours.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starter skill level

item.title: How to change starter skill level
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

Newbies these days…

But anyway lets cut to the chase. Search for your servers welcome message and you should be at a void called INITIALIZE. In this void there will be a lot of code. Look through the void until you find addSkillXP and delete it.

Read full topic
